name: Preferred Home Health Care and Nursing Services INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Preferred Home Health Care and Nursing Services INC is a Home Health provider based in Roseland, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $10.1M in Medicaid payments across 23K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $10.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
